transcript.text: In a competitive marketplace, our confidential information is a critical asset. In this module, learn what you need to do to protect our critical information.

contentBackground.img: A group of employees in a company office building.

panelText.text: At work, you may learn confidential information about our company, customers or business.
You need to protect this information and report any breaches of confidentiality.
Losing control of confidential information can damage our business, undermine our credibility with customers, help competitors and even break the law.
